turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, could you take a minute stop at starbucks i'd like a Caffè Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I'll go to the one between Franklin Ave Eastern Pkwy

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's Fine please make sure it it's made with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, what kind of sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular and make it a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Check and check, would you like whip cream as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about extra shots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes extra shots is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright i'm at the shop now placing your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, do you have my membership card with you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, and it has funds from your last visit.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright that's good please be sure to ask for extra sugar

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, i'll be sure to.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you I appreciate it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem at all. I just placed your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That was quick thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem at all. I'm sending you your receipt via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just got it! I'll see you later at the office

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright see you soon bye
